Button.name: Mazzifier_ReloadUIButton
Button.text: Push my button to finish spell!

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Use this menu to choose a button layout.", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1);

Scripts.OnLoad: this:SetText("Yes, please enable those add-ons first.");
